Package commandline

Class ShopCommandLine

java.lang.Object
commandline.ShopCommandLine
public class ShopCommandLine extends Object
Command line interface for the shop, allowing the player to view and buy stock, and sell their own items and monsters.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ShopCommandLine()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    run(GameEnvironment env)
    Command line interface for the shop, displaying the player's current gold and the shop's stock, and prompting the user to return to the prievious menu, choose an item to buy, or sell one of their own items or monsters.
    private void
    sell(Player pla, Shop shop)
    Command line interface to choose to sell an item, monster or return back to the shop.
    private void
    sellItem(Player pla, Shop shop)
    Command line interface for selling an item to the shop, the player's items are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose an item to sell.
    private void
    sellMonster(Player pla, Shop shop)
    Command line interface for selling a monster to the shop, the player's monster's are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose a monster to sell.

      private void sellItem(Player pla, Shop shop)
      Command line interface for selling an item to the shop, the player's items are displayed and the player is prompted to return to the prievious menu or choose an item to sell.

      Parameters:

      shop - Shop. The shop object.

    • run

      void run(GameEnvironment env)
      Command line interface for the shop, displaying the player's current gold and the shop's stock, and prompting the user to return to the prievious menu, choose an item to buy, or sell one of their own items or monsters.
